short_summary: Request for Proposal for housekeeping services at Valcartier Garrison
description: Janitorial services at the Valcartier Garrison in Courcelette, QC.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement**
================                                                                                       

[***Contract Title in English***](#contract-title-en)

* [***W6856-23V303 - Housekeeping services for various sectors, Valcartier - QC***](#contract-title-fa)

**Contract Reference**
------------------------

* ***Reference Number:*** `WS4244209584-Doc4251009707`
* ***Solicitation Number:*** `WS4244209584`

**Tender Details**
------------------

### Tender Status
The tender for housekeeping services has expired.

### Contract Summary
The Government of Canada is seeking proposals for janitorial services at the Valcartier Garrison in Courcelette, QC.

### Contract Period
* ***Contract Start Date:*** February 1, 2024
* ***Contract End Date: March 31, 2027

### Procurement Method
* ***Procurement Category:*** Service
* ***Method:*** Competitive – Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria
* ***Selection Method:*** Lowest Price

### Regions Affected
* ***Service Region:*** Quebec, excluding National Capital Region

### Trade Recognition
The tender is open to participating suppliers recognized under the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other trade agreements listed on the <link_to_gov_info_page>.

### Contact Information
For more information on this contract opportunity, please visit the [***notice URL***](#notice-url) or contact:
* ***Name:*** Jessica Cossette Fontaine
* ***Email:*** jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* See the contract notice for details.

### Technical Specifications
Prospective suppliers must read the technical specifications to understand the requirements for this contract.

### Contract Accessibility
Please note that this tender is subject to Canada's accessibility rules. http://www.pwgsc.gc.ca/contracting/pol/accessibility-eng.html for more information.
